Could last a little longer but very good for the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="2025007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=2025007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024216" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rezdits"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rezdits" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689540">rezdits</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 05:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>too heavy for college use while too simple for casual activities. a non metallic with a hint of vanilla and pineapple sauvage. lasts around 4-6 hours with moderate to low projection on 5-10 sprays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="2024216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=2024216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nihilistgodzillas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1888837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1888837.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nihilistgodzillas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Blue-1198.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1198.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Blue"title="Polo Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1888837">nihilistgodzillas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 23:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Leather fresh out of the tannery, including some faint leftover chemical used in its treatment, along with woody, metallic and green notes reminiscent of...well, riding on a coach! The PR blurb is pretty spot on. Beautiful bottle. Overall I like it, with some caveats.<br />
<br />
Bad performer on skin but very good staying power on clothes, leaves a very clean scent on them, average sillage but you will be noticed through the initial hour, very office friendly.<br />
<br />
it's a pretty unique scent, a bit like shoving your head into a handbag, some people seem to perceive it way more citrusy than I do. Also not cheap in south america, over the 100usd mark, as an example most JPG's can be found for the same price, so try it out first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="2001655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=2001655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995074" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DELTA55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1918404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DELTA55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989398" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="j-shades"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/279948"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.279948.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="j-shades" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Eclectic-Collections/Factor-7105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Factor"title="Factor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/279948">j-shades</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 19:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells exactly like Abercrombie First Instinct Blue, Also smells like Ed Hardy Born Wild For Men Christian Audigier, Smells really good just wish it lasted longer. My cat goes nuts when I wear this lol!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1989398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1989398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989174" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Masterschnozzle81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1784584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1784584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Masterschnozzle81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1784584">Masterschnozzle81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely generic “blue” mens fragrance. If you’re looking for pineapple and juniper like I was go somewhere else, it’s not here.<br />
<br />
Edit: After wearing a few more times I can pick up pineapple in the opening but not enough to justify the purchase. Nothing along the lines of Aventus or Hacivat. It is a good dumb reach if you are between the age of 15-23 and don't need much out of a fragrance, but for anyone who is genuinely passionate about fragrances this one should probably be a skip.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1989174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1989174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1887184">rifqreme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 01:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply this is creamy sauvage, i have 20+ fragrances but believe it or not this is my most complimented fragrance HAHA, i got 9 compliments so far and i’d tell you that you cant go wrong with this fragrance. It’s very versatile lasts up to 6 hours on my skin and strong sillage but hey on this price range this fragrance is very very good choice. 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1983203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1983203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1979107" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Roman86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/717236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.717236.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Roman86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1979107ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1979107" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/717236">Roman86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a gourmand type of smell so be prepared to wear it in the cooler weather. It's nice but nothing that impresses me. It's a middle-of-the-road sweet scent that can get cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1979107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1979107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972091" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="coonhound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1881689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="coonhound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881689">coonhound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-08">11/08/23 18:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First Pass - Similar to Coach Men, there is the same apple, the spices are much fainter.  And something else, but I can't quite put my finger on it.  Almost powdery and metallic...  Like an old barber shop and a neck shave with warm cream <br />
<br />
The pyramid shows pineapple, black pepper, and juniper as top.  Cashmeran, sage, and geranium as middle.  I don't know why this smells more like apple to me than pineapple, but it does.  So did its predecessor<br />
<br />
I think the powder is coming from the cashmeran and geranium.  No idea where I got "metallic."  Either my brain chose a lazy descriptor based solely off the name, or my memory made an association with the straight razor of the barber<br />
<br />
1 Hour Later - Much sweeter.  It's a fruity sweetness, and more powdery.  Think warm apple pie dusted with baby powder.  I still can't discern pineapple, but that has to be where all the fruity sweetness originates<br />
<br />
Pyramid has vanilla, leather, sandalwood, patchouli for base.  Vanilla definitely.  Leather likely responsible for the powdery note.  I don't get sandalwood.  If patchouli is here it's delicate, not the heavy-handed earthiness that usually comes to mind<br />
<br />
Overall - Fans of sweet, powdery scents will enjoy this one.  The black pepper mixes with the base notes to give some interesting complexity.  I don't like powdery or floral scents of any degree, so for me it was a no<br />
<br />
***Scents, like tastes, are subjective. Wear what you like***</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1972091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1972091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1971801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1971801" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cymba"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cymba" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15754.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa"title="Luna Rossa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1971801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1971801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838640">Cymba</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-08">11/08/23 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sauvage? Nope. It is creamy, and has a better dry down. No funky BO like Sauvage notes. Sweeter than LRCarbon. I like both, have both, and they're their own thing. Sometimes I really don't get the "Reminds me of" section.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1971801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1971801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1955696" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceAnon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceAnon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted by Night"title="Wanted by Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1955696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1955696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915">FragranceAnon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-19">10/19/23 02:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"Creamier, vanilla Sauvage" sounds about right to me, except it's softer, without the sharpness that Sauvage has especially in the opening.<br />
<br />
I only get the pineapple for a minute or so. Wish it stayed around longer, but I like the fragrance so much that I won't fault it for that.. The drydown is sweet, powdery, and addicting; perfect for cooler weather. <br />
<br />
Perfformance is moderate. No complaints in that department.<br />
<br />
Overall, I think this is excellent; can't stop smelling myself. Great price on discounters, versatile, easy to like.I don't know which one I like more, this or the original Coach for men. (Lleaning toward this.. but when summer hits and I start wearing the original, I'll probably change my tune.)<br />
<br />
This is a "love" for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1955696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1955696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950729" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pikachus_bananas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1863409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pikachus_bananas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950729ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950729" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1863409">Pikachus_bananas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 04:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Performance was a slight let down.<br />
Nice inoffensive office fragrance. Clean fresh, slightly woody.<br />
<br />
if you mixed Platinum Egoiste with a little spice and removed the metallic lavender note it would be exactly this (at least to my nose).<br />
<br />
Safe blind buy but wont wow you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1950729"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1950729#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945537" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 09:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#262 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
Likeable, inexpensive, office safe, appropriate for all occasions and seasons, generic as dirt. There are dozens of scents with the same DNA, like Dylan Blue, Cristiano Renaldo Legacy, Bleu de Chanel, Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, it's a long list of scents, all in the same ball-park, all of which I like better than this, and there are also a dozen Arab clones for $18-30. <br />
<br />
This is an EDP, not that you can tell, but what can you expect for $32? To my nose it does lean more Nick Jonas Varvatos in that it's likeable, not distinctive, impotent (the scent, not Nick Jonas, or at least I haven't heard anything). If you commute more than a half-hour I'm not sure anyone who isn't skin close will be able to smell this on you when you arrive. <br />
<br />
You could get pretty much the same "creamier vanilla than Sauvage" thing with Ted Lapidus Altamir, a very under-appreciated fragrance for $20, which performs as well as this that I think you'd like as well if not better. FYI, the sprayer on this bottle didn't work until I cut away and removed the rubber dog-tag thingy, and even after it barely functioned, so don't be surprised.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1945537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1945537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515487">hussrahal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Slept on gem.<br />
Got  3.4 oz tester for $27, for that price it's a must-cop if you want a creamier vanillic Dior sauvage type DNA.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1944193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1944193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1940908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1940908" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JasKiew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1611442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JasKiew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-C-L-U-B-72707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72707.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia C.L.U.B."title="Colonia C.L.U.B."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1940908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1940908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442">JasKiew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-30">09/30/23 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Platinum Coach<br />
<br />
I feel it's the best outta the 4. Pineapple Sauvage like scent with muskiness and a nice drydown, not too sweet. Inexpensive too. It last pretty well for a coach longevity wise</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1940908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1940908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1926615" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toyboy38"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414444.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toyboy38" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Papilefiko-74667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Papilefiko"title="Papilefiko"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1926615ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1926615" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414444">Toyboy38</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-12">09/12/23 23:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got this today. <br />
<br />
I don't agree with a certain age demographic on this one. This is not for college students or young professionals IMHO. <br />
It is just a casual wear fragrance for men. It's on the sweeter side considering its vanilla heavy. In the dry-down I do get Prada luna rossa Carbon about 60-70%. It definitely reminds me of it, though not a clone.<br />
<br />
I guess the down-voters for that 'reminds me of' section never waited for the dry-down before casting a vote.<br />
As for the opening. There is a faint pineapple with musky metallic note concoction. Not in the direction of Le beau. Much much much more feint when it comes to the pineapple note. Barely noticeable. <br />
<br />
If you have Carbon and love it, pass on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1926615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1926615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920860" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1920860" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nirvblakr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766190"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1766190.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nirvblakr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Silver-Birch-Lavender-Cologne-59427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Birch & Lavender Cologne"title="Silver Birch & Lavender Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1920860ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1920860" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766190">nirvblakr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-05">09/05/23 23:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has a fruity, sweet candy fragrance. It would be appropriate for college students and young professionals. Like H24 but with a stronger presence. I surmise better longevity and Projection. I was reluctant to buy this but was new from the store and when I tried it on you know it smells familiar. No originality. But when compared side by side with what you thought it smelled like, you'll notice the difference. First time to use it so we'll see how it performs.<br />
The bottle looks metallic but when shone with bright light, you'll see the juice level.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1920860"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1920860#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915129" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kustomeyez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1528791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kustomeyez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Elixir-71708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Elixir"title="1 Million Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915129ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915129" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791">Kustomeyez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 04:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just asking why in the world in the pros and cons section does it claim it to be a con, that coach platinum doesn’t smell like Dior Sauvage or isn’t similar to Sauvage ! ! Is that a bad thing? 🤷🏼♂️🤦♂️🤦♂️🤦♂️🤦♂️🤦♂️🤦♂️ That’s just crazy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1915129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1915129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902684" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="firestorm202"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777038"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777038.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="firestorm202" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777038">firestorm202</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-15">08/15/23 06:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it. I tried OG, this one, and Green at dept. store and ended up ordering Platinum online (for less than half what they wanted at Macy's).<br />
Performance on my skin is OK (I get 2-4 hours), it does not last that long, but I would still recommend it. <br />
Inoffensive, nice pineapple opening, and very pleasant dry-down, can be worn in many different scenarios, and many different temperatures.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1902684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1902684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902217" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902217" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crlneria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1713240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="crlneria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902217ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902217" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713240">crlneria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-14">08/14/23 15:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very safe, well-balanced fragrance. The opening smells very similar to savage. Very masculine, woody, fresh. As it starts to settle down the fruity vanilla takes over. As someone mentioned before, it’s kinda like the faint smell you get as you approach the department store perfume department. Dry down is very very faint, with the vanilla upfront. Kinda smells like a fancy sunblock lotion. I like this one, just wish the more masculine notes from the opening would carry over to the drydown. Overall I’m happy with the price point and versatility of this fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1902217"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1902217#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1901455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It doesn’t smell like cologne though. If I was blind folded , and someone sprayed it on me, I would think it would of came out of a aerosol can, it has that type of vibe mix with more vanilla/leather and little pineapple and cashmeran on the top. I feel like best use for this is for lunch dates and running errands. The O.G is more versatile,for the office Doctors appointments meetings. If you can get the 3.3’s for under $50 it’s worth it. Platinum 8.0/10 O.G 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1895874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1895874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891109" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcoelho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcoelho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Precious-Liquid/Blue-Agave-46155.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46155.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blue Agave"title="Blue Agave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325">frankcoelho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wife got me this one for Valentine's and I am in love with it!<br />
I did have this one in my wish list for a while and, form test I had done, this was THE Coach fragrance for me.<br />
The smell is great, very easy to wear (signature scent worth), and a compliment getter up close. My wife definitely enjoys it as well, even with thinking this works best in the evening. The vanilla here is surreal, but it does smell synthetic - I sneeze quite a bit when I spray this one. Think I can even be allergic to something in the composition.<br />
Nevertheless, worth buying it and I'm sure you'll love it too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1891109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1891109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1890885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283300">Daviako</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 02:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like Coach Platinum more each time I wear it. It reminds me of going through a store like Macy's or Dillard's. After leaving the men's fragrance area, you'd usually enter the women's shoe section. This is the precise crossing point that this fragrance captures. The combination of everything sprayed in the air with the smell of the leather from the shoes makes Platinum a very reminiscent fragrance.<br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1890885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1890885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1887096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1861185" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tsyen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1752994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1752994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tsyen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1861185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1861185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1752994">tsyen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-21">06/21/23 02:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening does smell a bit like Dior sauvage but it lasted only for like 30 secs and turned into vanilla. For some reasons it reminds me more of Zara’s Rich Warm Addictive. May be it’s the sweetness of this fragrance. After that the scent has some slight metallic feel to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1861185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1861185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1839484" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CrustyNgl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1749082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1749082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CrustyNgl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1839484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1839484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1749082">CrustyNgl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-22">05/22/23 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On clothes it does smell like the dry down of sauvage but for the most part it smells nothing alike. The opening is fruity and kinda sweet. After that dies down, it smells something like cashews or some other nut which is probably the cashmere note. The dry down smells like vanilla with a hint of leather. I like the smell but it just doesn’t last. I barely get 4 hours. Sillage is mediocre as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1839484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1839484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1836878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1836878" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bananatrousers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1724180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bananatrousers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1836878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1836878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724180">bananatrousers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-19">05/19/23 06:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not-too-loud blue frag that smells like vanilla + Sauvage EdT <br />
<br />
This is actually surprisingly complex for the price point. I can definitely pick out each note on the note break down. It opens fruity that very much reminds me of Sauvage EdT. The pineapple here is beautiful<br />
<br />
The ambroxan is here but it's not nuclear.<br />
<br />
It dries down to a vanilla-leathery-blue which is still versatile but gives it more density making it slightly lean towards cooler or climate-controlled environments than beaches and summer middays but with controlled spraying this will do it's job very well. I know that the DNA is not the same but this frag's use-case scenario would be similar to YSL Y EDP for me except that Coach Platinum does not have the same strength.<br />
<br />
Treating this like subdued and slightly sweeter Sauvage will give you the best use-case scenarios for this fragrance. This works very well if you're looking to wear the Sauvage DNA but in a scenario where you don't want much sillage and projection as in the office or similar situations. In this scenario this perfume does its job very very well.<br />
<br />
I'll be using this frag often.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1836878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1836878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1822796" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Candyandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222545"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1222545.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Candyandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1822796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1822796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222545">Candyandy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-02">05/02/23 00:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Platinum is closer to Sauvage than the original Coach for men is, even though that one is often presented as a more affordable Sauvage alternative. Coach Platinum takes a strong inspiration from Sauvage EdT and adds some sweet notes. They are different kind of sweet notes than what Dior added when they went from Sauvage EdT to EdP. Coach is more about the vanilla, but don't expect a vanilla bomb or a heavy, evening-type scent, this is still very much a blue, fresh daytime scent.<br />
Overall I think it's fine, you could do worse, but my for what it's worth my girlfiend doesn't like it and I don't enjoy it enough to even buy it to wear for myself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1822796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1822796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
