Sweet lovely opening goes woodsy/leathery and a bit more generic in the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1808680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1808680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1806589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1806589" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pakistanstar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pakistanstar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Profondo"title="Acqua di Giò Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1806589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1806589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416694">pakistanstar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-11">04/11/23 22:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hmmm. Coach Platinum doesn't quite have the moisturising effect of Sauvage but it does a decent job if you're on a budget. Pineapple smells awesome (except in beta fragrances like Aventus) and it's no exception here. This is definitely a unique scent as you don't see this combination of notes too often. That cashmeran is off its head. Makes the vanilla overdose that I hate actually wearable. Can't believe I actually like something that is vanilla dominant, hope I'm not sick. The bottle is cool and adds to the uniqueness but is let down by a POS atomiser. Probably wouldn't buy it again but it's nice to own it as the snobs all hate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1806589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1806589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804140" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lhomme_Juanco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1680123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lhomme_Juanco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680123">Lhomme_Juanco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 17:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update on the fragrance after dry down:<br />
<br />
Leather is very prominent on my skin. It’s a very chemical leather almost to the point that it smells green. Which isn’t bad, i like the smell. To my nose this smells like Ultramale + Sauvage + Coolwater edt and an added leather note. <br />
Very weird fragrance I have to say I wasn’t expecting this smell. But hey I like it so far <br />
The atomizer is just kind of a pain becaus it’s one of those kind of weighted ones but it’s hard to get a good squirt on it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1804140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1804140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804115" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lhomme_Juanco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1680123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lhomme_Juanco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804115ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804115" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680123">Lhomme_Juanco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 17:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sprayed this for the first time on my left hand and immediately became very fresh and green spicy. Then a little sweetness kicked in and I found it similar to Sauvage and F black. <br />
Sprayed on my right wrist and it became a chocolatey fresh and sweet fragrance.<br />
Absolutely no idea how that happens but it’s pretty good for the price. It’s quality is hard to beat for 30-60 dollar range</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1804115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1804115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1800367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1800367" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RogueZXRO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RogueZXRO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1800367ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1800367" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330655">RogueZXRO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-04">04/04/23 10:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the sweetest from the line. It smells of vanilla and pineapple sweetness. A bit woody too and can be a little overwhelming to wear when it’s hot or in an office-style environment. The projection and longevity are strong on my skin. Also smells similar to Sauvage Parfum which I love. Overall, a great fragrance that is worth buying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1800367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1800367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1799519" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="andrewpc84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428280"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1428280.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="andrewpc84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diesel/Plus-Plus-Masculine-494.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.494.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Plus Plus Masculine"title="Plus Plus Masculine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1799519ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1799519" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428280">andrewpc84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-03">04/03/23 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright and well-rounded with a youthful and casual accord, a barbershop element, and a sweet powdery vanilla base. <br />
<br />
Versatile but not suitable for austere office environments due to its sweet and potentially cloying nature. <br />
<br />
It is a good option for fans of no brainer grab and go's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1799519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1799519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1798192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1798192" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TipTopNotes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1538832.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TipTopNotes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1798192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1798192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538832">TipTopNotes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-01">04/01/23 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yes, this does smell similar to Dior Sauvage EDT, or even Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, but it's not a carbon-copy (heh). I like to think this would be released in an alternate-universe where the Sauvage line evolved in a more generic way: where the newly-released EDP didn't introduce that mysterious and thick-spicy anise, nutmeg and vanilla. No, no, no. This bizarro Sauvage evolution went for thickening and sweetening up the peppery-sharpness of the EDT with leather and vanilla. It's Sauvage made creamy, sweet, and admittedly more boring. It's still a good scent but I'm happy the real Sauvage line went with a more creative way of warming up the original's DNA.<br />
<br />
However, my bottle quickly developed an issue with the atomizer where every other spray would be an un-atomized liquid stream instead of a mist. And this stream would shoot out at a 30-degree angle to the left or right. It became a massive hassle to wear this, having to plan carefully and aim to ensure that WHEN it shot out sideways, it wouldn't shoot onto a wall or the floor. I eventually decanted most of the bottle into some travel atomizers. I'm docking it some points for the nuisance it's been. Scentwise, it's a 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1798192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1798192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1760343" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1760343" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Angelbeast56"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Angelbeast56" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/Hawas-for-Him-46890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hawas for Him"title="Hawas for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1760343ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1760343" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665129">Angelbeast56</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-14">02/14/23 22:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like Mont Blanc explorer and Versace Eros had a baby I get the pineapple fruitiness with beautiful vanilla and sandalwood with spices in the background then it becomes fresh with cashmeren and sage then the dry down it becomes this beautiful subtle vanilla fruity fragrance that will get you compliments 100% I have gotten so many compliments with this one and I think the best part of this fragrance is the opening I just love the blast of fruit,vanilla,spices this is one of the best fragrances in my collection and it last 6-7 hours with decent silage which is pretty good I highly recommend buying this one it is the best flanker.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1755218" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="inFidel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222151"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1222151.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="inFidel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1755218ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1755218" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222151">inFidel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-08">02/08/23 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice pineapply opening with a bit of spice that later become warmer with vanilla and light florals. Pretty nice for the price.<br />
<br />
Performance is not great but that's to be expected with Coach and with the price you pay for it.<br />
<br />
Smells nothing like Sauvage though, the 150 people that upvoted the similarity to Sauvage are either trolls or in the middle of Corona virus having their senses twisted completely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Buy this if you’re looking for something cheap and versatile, although there are better options out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1754457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1754457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1753588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Scent 7.5<br />
Performance 7<br />
Sillage 7<br />
Longevity 6.5<br />

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665129">Angelbeast56</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-26">01/26/23 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelled this fragrance at macys and I was thinks of coach for man og or this one I got this one because I love vanilla fresh fragrances and when came I was very surprised because it has a fresh fruity opening then it becomes this woody,sweet leathery fragrance it is very unique it only kinda smells like Dior sauvage but with some creed aventus dna like just remnants but overall I have never smelled a fragrance like this and it’s good for all year round but just not in the freezing cold so spring is the best time to wear it but it’s still very versatile</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445970">DamianB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-24">01/24/23 22:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I picked this up a couple of years ago specifically for the bright pineapple note in the opening. I really enjoyed it at the time but grew out of it and have rarely worn it in the intervening time. Last night I decided to spray it before bed and was very disappointed that the sweet pineapple facet has utterly disappeared. What's left in the bottle (&gt;75%) is almost indistinguishable from an old bottle of Animale Animale I purchased maybe 6 months ago.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721657" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miggo02"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1647327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1647327.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miggo02" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1647327">Miggo02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-31">12/31/22 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received this by mail today. It was a blind buy but I’m not disappointed at all. It smells great to me, very masculine and sexy, I’d say it’s more youthful (20-30yrs). I’m 21 and it’s perfect for me. Similar to Carbon but with a slight difference. Perfect for all year round, day or night. Definitely get this. Not bad for $40 (2oz)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1721657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1721657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1716793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1716793" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="seldomseen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="seldomseen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Eau-de-Parfum-Reserve-Privee-71272.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71272.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Reserve Privée"title="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Reserve Privée"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1716793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1716793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067640">seldomseen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-24">12/24/22 23:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While Coach Platinum by Coach isn't a groundbreaking or amazing fragrance --- it certainly is quite nice. Especially for being a second tier designer blue/shower gel fragrance. As others have stated Platinum is a hybrid of Dior Sauvage (EDT), Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, and Mont Blanc Explorer. However, more so Prada Luna Rossa Carbon with a twist of Mont Blanc Explorer. <br />
<br />
The main differences that Platinum has are its creamy, silky, vanillic, woody, leathery attributes which makes Platinum much smoother and "natural" smelling than Dior Sauvage (EDT), Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, and Mont Blanc Explorer. <br />
<br />
Coach Platinum by Coach may be a redundant fragrance for many people. However, it would be an excellent choice for newer noses and/or people that don't own any of the aforementioned fragrances - due to Platinum's improved rendition of the overused/popular mass-appealing, blue/shower gel masculine scent profile. Coach did an excellent job at giving Platinum a higher quality scent composition and smell. As Platinum doesn't smell like hastily composed, cheap smelling flanker. <br />
<br />
Platinum is a workhorse and most people will easily yield 12+ hours. 👍 Platinum is a very safe blind buy especially for discounted prices. I would recommend getting a tester bottle for added value!  <br />
<br />
Overall: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1716793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1716793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708274" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1708274" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="otteromkram"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="otteromkram" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Opium-Pour-Homme-562.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.562.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opium Pour Homme"title="Opium Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1708274ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1708274" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302803">otteromkram</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-13">12/13/22 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells somewhat like a candle.<br />
<br />
Cremo had a limited-edition cologne carried at Walmart called Hemp &amp; Golden Amber, and I get a little of that with Coach Platinum.<br />
<br />
Once it dries down, vanilla becomes more prominent, with cashmere in full support, and the rest of the base notes in tow. <br />
<br />
Initial rating: 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1708274"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1708274#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1690383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nothing mind-blowing here. Smells very similar to Sauvage and Luna Rossa Carbon, but more creamy and less metallic. Performance is moderate. The price is great (ONLY ON DISCOUNTERS)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1690383"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1690383#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1681492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1681492" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LargeMirrorWithOakFrame"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593393"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LargeMirrorWithOakFrame" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1681492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1681492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593393">LargeMirrorWithOakFrame</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-05">11/05/22 08:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this, you got to open the bottle, spray a couple times then let it ferment for a few days. It smells amazing.<br />
<br />
At first i get a bit of citrus and liquorice which quickly settles into sweet orange peppery wood note. Very versitile and any age can pull it off. Might be leaning a bit more youthful due to the sweetness. Lasts easy 6 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1681492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1681492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1680528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1680528" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chris parfum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1601784.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chris parfum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50777.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coach Platinum"title="Coach Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1680528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1680528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601784">Chris parfum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-03">11/03/22 22:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stunning top notes of a strong mix of citrus and vanilla becoming more of a moderate dry vanilla smell carrying over with other notes like white musk and a more mellowed out version of that citrus which is now more in the back as vanilla takes the front stage overall a great fragrance for men with good versatility very happy to see the formula changes made from a bit ago</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1680528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1680528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1673786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1673786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fanzypants"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.48578.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fanzypants" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Afro-Leather-95267.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95267.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Afro Leather"title="Afro Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1673786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1673786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48578">fanzypants</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-25">10/25/22 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Bruno has put together some good stuff with the original and platinum men's fragrances.  I like them more and more as time goes on.  Coach Platinum opens with a slightly sweet orangey pineapple note.  I really like it, it sits on some soft woods and I think the pepper and leather notes are balanced really well against the vanilla.  <br />
After a couple of hours, the vanilla is more prominent and can be detected on clothes for several more hours.  It doesn't really project so it's more suited for close encounters; I've had people not let me go so they could hug me longer since I smelled so "delicious".<br />
<br />
I think it's a great casual fragrance for day and night across all seasons; signature worthy just like the original Coach for men, and other mild spicy freshies.  In comparison to other frags I find similar, it does not come close to how versatile and strong my Dior Sauvage edt was, instead it is more calm and reserved.  It is much better balanced, longer lasting and more inviting than my Ajmal Zeal - I probably won't use that again until I finish this.  This is really really good.  Thanks Coach Bruno!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1673786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1673786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1661656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1659437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1659437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1657295" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Banklord"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204349.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Banklord" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1657295ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1657295" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1657295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1657295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1650586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1650586" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lwhaymand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lwhaymand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1650586ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1650586" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298290">lwhaymand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-22">09/22/22 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you want to make as many people as possible think you smell pleasant, Coach Platinum is a good bet. It's citrusy, it's pineapply, it's both fresh and sweet, and it's almost impossible to dislike. The only drawback is that the projection is soft and the longevity moderate, even for a cheap fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1650586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1650586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1647542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1647542" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pacer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560020"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1560020.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pacer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Cologne-1004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Cologne"title="Allure Homme Sport Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1647542ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1647542" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560020">Pacer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-18">09/18/22 01:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a pretty good frag, deeper than what I first thought. <br />
<br />
The opening is clean, powdery and creamy, but not soapy. The pineapple wasn't sharp, more milky with the vanilla. The opening blended into the mid without too much of a shift....still really nice. I can smell cacao/chocolate in there somewhere, but it's not listed in the notes.<br />
<br />
I was worried that the mid would turn into a sickly sweet dry down, but a subtle leathery scent came to the front - vanilla and sandalwood behind it. It finished quite differently than it started on my skin - a great ride all the way through. <br />
<br />
I thought this would be solely a safe office scent, but it's more than that.<br />
<br />
EDIT 08/2024: I ended up giving this away. I don't dislike it, I just never chose to wear it over others.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1647542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1647542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1646675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1646675" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vtdsz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vtdsz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cartier/Declaration-307.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.307.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Declaration"title="Declaration"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1646675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1646675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078621">vtdsz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-16">09/16/22 17:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a sugary copycat of Dior sauvage.<br />
That's the real proof that something bad can get even worse, if one tries...<br />
Lots of people say that Dior Sauvage is a totally synthetic mixture, based on algorithms for the dream-cologne made for the younger generation, who was pleading for something "stronger"+"louder"+"longer"... which can be translated as: "suffocating"+"obnoxious"+"lingering".<br />
Coach Platinum has all the mass appeal excesses of Dior Sauvage, but escalates to a new nauseating level by adding VANILLA, which, like garlic and onions should be restricted to your kitchen prep.<br />
It's not true that Sauvage is totally synthetic... Actually Sauvage has its fragrance replicated in Nature. Whoever has crashed by accident a stinky bug, knows that Sauvage and the poor smashed creature smells the same, but AMBROXAN adds the toxic "tenacity" to that smell, like an olfactory steroids. <br />
COACH PLATINUM smells tragic, just like a swarm of stinking bugs got smashed by a falling wall inside a pastry shop. It smells as bad as your imagination takes you...<br />
Educated noses should "exorcise" this bottle and<br />
stay as far as possible, either if you are tragically the offender or the victim.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1646675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1646675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1639591" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1639591" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="3 SPRAYS AH DAY"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1547674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="3 SPRAYS AH DAY" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1639591ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1639591" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1547674">3 SPRAYS AH DAY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-06">09/06/22 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WAS QUITE SURPRISED BY THE WAY IT SMELLED...IT'S A BEAUTIFUL FRAGRANCE</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1639591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1639591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1613812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1613812" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tylrmrtn98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1349644.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tylrmrtn98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1613812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1613812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349644">tylrmrtn98</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-30">07/30/22 19:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was just messing around with my fragrances and combined sauvage and explorer on my wrist. The dry down on that combo and Platinum are the same but platinum has added vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1613812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1613812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1604149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1604149" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JupiterMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1354289.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JupiterMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1604149ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1604149" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354289">JupiterMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-16">07/16/22 06:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you like Pina Colada...this is a creamy pineapple in the opening. Soon dries down to slightly peppery. Smooth and soft with a bit of sweetness. It is a nice designer cologne, but lacks an edge. It's not very strong on me, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1604149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1604149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1599957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1599957" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ricarvic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/172373"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.172373.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ricarvic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Omniscient-Mr-Thompson-84254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Omniscient Mr Thompson"title="The Omniscient Mr Thompson"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1599957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1599957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/172373">ricarvic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-09">07/09/22 18:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the people that say this doesn’t smell at all like Sauvage, with all due respect, please check your noses! Of course it smells like Sauvauge except this dries down mainly smelling like vainilla (sweeter) and peppery with just a hint of the aromatic and fresh accords that resemble Sauvage and Luna Rossa Carbon. This would be very similar to the Sauvage EDP version but like I said, sweeter, due to the aforementioned vainilla. Obviously the Dior version lasts, projects and has more quality overall than CP. But given the price I must say Coach Platinum is a very good fragrance in general and a blind buy!! Definitely has its own personality!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1599957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1599957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1591358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1591358" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The smelly scientist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517529"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1517529.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The smelly scientist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Profondo"title="Acqua di Giò Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1591358ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1591358" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517529">The smelly scientist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-25">06/25/22 15:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is great, I wish the fruit stuck around longer. The cashmeran is light and I don’t get alot of leather so it kinda turns into a creamy airy vanilla  with a tiny bit of spice and wood. I consider this a unisex fragrance it is not very traditionally masculine it’s more for a metro sexual type of masculine. Performance is moderate, but less than I’d expect for an edp with these heart notes. Projection is good for an hour or so but then shrinks. It’s not bad it’s just not anything special. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1591358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1591358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1586548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I’m not mad at it. It’s pretty cheap on eBay. The smell is like a step in between the edt and edp. At least when the ladies ask is that Sauvage, you can say no😂</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1586548"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1586548#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1573474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
