align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1573474"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1573474#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1564662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1564662" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoseBlind70"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204346"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204346.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoseBlind70" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-607.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.607.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport"title="Allure Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1564662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1564662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204346">NoseBlind70</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-15">05/15/22 17:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just wish that the opening blast of citrusy pineapple stayed a lot longer because after the dry down the black pepper note is very prominent, almost to the point of being cloying. I initially liked this but after a few wearings I got bored with it. I got it cheap, like under £30 so I just took the L.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1564662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1564662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1540621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1540621" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gxbjw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251939"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1251939.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gxbjw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1540621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1540621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251939">gxbjw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-10">04/10/22 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Closer than Mont Blanc Legend Spirit than to Sauvage.<br />
<br />
Very fruity and slightly powdery, but a decent scent nonetheless. I can detect the leather very faintly, but it’s far from being prominent.<br />
<br />
Good dumb reach because it’s highly versatile, but sadly not unique at all. The performance also leaves a lot to be desired.<br />
<br />
Cool Water Intense is a better fragrance that serves the same purpose. I reckon it’s better priced too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1540621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1540621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1540261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1540261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spartaksci"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1260013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spartaksci" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1540261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1540261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260013">spartaksci</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-09">04/09/22 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A more dense and grown-up version of Pepe Jeans For Him. Pineapple really stands out on the initial blast but gets more tame during the drydown. I like it. I get why people would compare this to Sauvage, there's that "roundness" present here but everything else has nothing to do with it.<br />
Very pleasant and safe scent but it will not blow you away. I'd say it's a versatile frag, smells good and you can use as an office scent or even a casual date night. All seasons honestly.<br />
Performance is meh, but gets the job done. For 30 bucks you won't feel ripped off cause trust me, there's a bunch of worse frags than this in the same price range.<br />
<br />
EDIT: Changed my opinion on the performance. Sprayed this again after having the bottle sit on my closet for about 3 weeks. I can still faintly smell it the day after on my arm. Guess it makes the EDP tag some justice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1540261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1540261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; smells good though. can last longer though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1531242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1531242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1530736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1530736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Agonzalez918"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478371"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Agonzalez918" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1530736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1530736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478371">Agonzalez918</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-26">03/26/22 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The smell is very fresh, but I feel like it lacks in longevity. I enjoy that during the warmer season that I am able to wear it with no worry of smelling a little sour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1530736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1530736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1530192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1530192" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colognester"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328927"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="colognester" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1530192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1530192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328927">colognester</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-25">03/25/22 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved how this smelled. It’s very much like Sauvage but more “chic” which is exactly what I would expect from the brand, Coach. The bottle I sampled at Macys gave me excellent performance. I didn’t want to pay full retail so I ordered one from fragrancenet and the performance was much worse. Like 4 hours tops it also wasn’t as vivid as the one from Macys. Anyways, this is a great fragrance if you like the Sauvage DNA but want something smoother and more “upscale”. If you hate Sauvage or Prada Carbon, don’t even bother with this as you will hate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1530192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1530192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1522641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1498485" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siege41290"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417242"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1417242.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siege41290" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Eau-de-Parfum-50757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Eau de Parfum"title="Y Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1498485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1498485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417242">Siege41290</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-05">02/05/22 19:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this on discount for about $55. The opening bursts with a pure scent of alcohol before quickly changing to a fruity sweet blast of pineapple pepper and juniper. It very quickly changes to a woody, vanilla almost minty scent. The smell is amazing from the opening to the mid to the dry down. My one major issue is performance. The projection is weak and the great smell that projects doesn’t last long and quickly tones down to at best a skin scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1498485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1498485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1482132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1478942" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="timecapsule96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263892"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263892.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="timecapsule96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1478942ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1478942" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); I agree with others when they say it’s like Dior but equipped with vanilla! Maybe if I had gotten my hands on this first I would’ve been more for this nice fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1478942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1478942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1478828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437418">the_sniffer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-08">01/08/22 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Better than Dior sauvage IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1473655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Migueld92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416222"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416222.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Migueld92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-38686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted"title="Wanted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1473655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1473655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416222">Migueld92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-30">12/30/21 22:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my most used dumb reach fragrance in Fall and Winter. I have OG coach for men but this being an Eau De Parfum does better on my skin. This is more for night time use instead of OG but works good for day as well. I get solid 6 hours of arms length projection from this when I spray about 5x two going into clothes. Projects outside of arm length for like 50 minutes though. I love the cashmere and vanilla implementation in this very much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1473655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1473655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1473100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398593">Swavey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-18">11/18/21 20:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is so good honestly. It is nice and sweet with the vanilla and it has a super creamy and sweet pineapple scent to it that I love. After it dries down a bit I get sandalwood and leather and vanilla from it which is an amazing combo. Nice fruity and I got it for like 100 CAD at shoppers so I’d say its decently cheap and its definitely versatile for all seasons. Kinda reminds me of a pina colada. 100% recommend it for people that like sauvage and want something sweeter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1448414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1448414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1444271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This might become a favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1444271"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1444271#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1443849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1443849" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Harry_Gill"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1217915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Harry_Gill" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1443849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1443849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217915">Harry_Gill</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-11">11/11/21 02:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heavily underrated scent the opening is fresh pineapple which then drys down to a creamy vanilla easily wear any time of the year it is my signature scent longevity is good not great about 5 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1443849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1443849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1440535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1440535" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Flexfragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227333"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1227333.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Flexfragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/London-for-Men-804.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.804.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="London for Men"title="London for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1440535ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1440535" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227333">Flexfragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-05">11/05/21 07:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pineapple with tons of vanilla and a touch of pear imo. It's really nice, I use it mostly on night outs, get tons on compliments from it. One time i've even wrote down this one on a piece of paper for the bartender who detected my smell instantly as i walked up to the bar for drink. He really must loved it cuz i got that drink for free x)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1440535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1440535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1426035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1426035" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oceansoflorewi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1225449.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oceansoflorewi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Gabbana-pour-Homme-1994-483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce&Gabbana pour Homme (1994)"title="Dolce&Gabbana pour Homme (1994)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1426035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1426035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225449">oceansoflorewi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-10">10/10/21 22:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had to boost my sweet alluring date fragrance category so I bought this from a date video recommendation. <br />
<br />
Particularly this is suggested as a great summer date fragrance. Since I LOVE the original salty grape soda woody ambroxan Coach for men- I picked this up without question or research.<br />
<br />
I've tried this now on 5 separate occasions- UGH... I don't get it. This is a TOTAL downgrade to the original. They took the original Coach for men, added a heck town of 'powder' of some sort, reduced the juicy grape sparkle, turned the tropical top into a distant fruit note (pineapple- not at all get the Aventus dna out of your head), left the metallic notes, and added a cheapened muted vanilla. <br />
<br />
The top smells like some old expired french vanilla creamer in the back of your pantry from 1995. It dry's down to that soda vibe like the original yet no sparkle- more a flat lukewarm soda you left out for the night. You gotta be kidding me with this release. I wouldn't even spray this in my bathroom after a brutal stanky deuce. <br />
<br />
I'm not sure whether to be thankful or offended but the scent isn't even that present and strong. Either it is riddled with the cheapest cost cutting shortcuts in the entire fragrance industry or it causes the most contagious form of anosmia. Gosh- this SUCKS!<br />
<br />
Also how dare you all compare this to Goldrush for men- that is a stunning cardamom, lavender, amber - vanilla cheapie that is LIGHTYEARS above this dna.<br />
<br />
There are so so SOOO many better alluring fruity powder vanilla scents out there. This is honest to god the worst I have ever smelled in this category.<br />
<br />
-5/10 Bye felicia</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1426035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1426035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1419941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1419941" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afrikano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afrikano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1419941ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1419941" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419">Afrikano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-30">09/30/21 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Should have got this instead of the original CFM. Loved it instantly. Very smooth yet still a tad fresh, and slightly sweet. Definitely gonna rock this a lot this fall season. I think the heavy pear in the original CFM throws me off but this right here is a winner. Great scent for the price and great performance too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1419941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1419941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1417406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1417406" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perryry2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230626"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230626.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="perryry2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Tres-Fraiche-24060.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.24060.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Eau Tres Fraiche"title="Terre d'Hermes Eau Tres Fraiche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1417406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1417406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230626">perryry2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-26">09/26/21 11:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have no idea what these people are talking about on here.  Smells Nothing like Sauvage, or Luna Rossa Carbon.  <br />
To sum this up, this is a very mass appealing creamy pineapple fragrance.  The most prominent notes would be the pineapple, and the sandalwood, and vanilla.  with less prominent but still there leather, and cashmeran.  The juniper, and pepper, and sage just act to lift the creaminess and make the opening a little more crisp and refreshing.  Overall I think this is a completely unique fragrance.  There are plenty of Aventus style pineapple and juniper, or pineapple and current fragrances out there this one takes the refreshing pineapple opening and goes in a powdery creamy direction with its vanilla/sandalwood/leather/cashmeran.  I think it dries down to a powdery leather vibe with the vanilla and leather. I can't think of anything similar to this.  I think thats why the reviews are so all over the place.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1417406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1417406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1403587" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1403587" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="weirddavey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1031192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1031192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="weirddavey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Bel-Ami-Vetiver-22616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bel Ami Vetiver"title="Bel Ami Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1403587ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1403587" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1031192">weirddavey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-03">09/03/21 04:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can see the comparisons to Sauvage, but to me personally - this is more like PDM Pegasus just a little less sweet. It has that similar powdery vibe. Overall, pretty nice daily fragrance though its on the lighter side performance wise.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1403587"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1403587#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1395906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1395906" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="billblm93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1377508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="billblm93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1395906ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1395906" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377508">billblm93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-20">08/20/21 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>nice one<br />
close to sauvage this one has more vanilla than ambrox<br />
versatile could be worn all year round<br />
nice quality <br />
nice cheapie sweet but not cloying<br />
drydown : suede and vanilla<br />
average performance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1395906"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1395906#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1395050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1395050" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tumiknows"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288158"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1288158.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tumiknows" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bentley/Bentley-for-Men-Intense-17666.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17666.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bentley for Men Intense"title="Bentley for Men Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1395050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1395050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288158">tumiknows</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-19">08/19/21 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my first impression of this fragrance, I got it totally wrong!<br />
<br />
After wearing this fragrance for a while, I have grown to appreciate and really like it. The opening is indeed sweet/fruity and peppery - the pineapple note really stands out. It gets less sweet as it evolves. I particularly enjoy how it evolves when it dries down to the base - the vanilla, leather and sandalwood come through and give you a creamy woody and fruity vibe. <br />
<br />
This is unique scent, which is well blended. It is not beast mode, it is just right. The longevity is good on my skin - I get about 7-8 hours. I think Coach Platinum can be worn all year round. However, I think it shines in the warmer times like spring, mild summer days and autumn. <br />
<br />
It is unique but not quite signature scent worthy. You stand out and I have gotten a decent number of compliments. <br />
The scent is also versatile and can be worn to just about any activity e.g. the office, gym, casual days and also on date nights. <br />
This is a dope fragrance. I really dig it and enjoy wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1395050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1395050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1390862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1390862" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ObsessedJoydjay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/838364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.838364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ObsessedJoydjay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1390862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1390862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/838364">ObsessedJoydjay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-11">08/11/21 23:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kinda like somewhere around Paco Rabanne 1 Million Lucky &amp; Pure XS..<br />
Not quite the more intense Ultra Male/Emporio Armani Stronger with You type, it's more for dates/close encounter kinda occasions.<br />
Korloff Ultimate Man &amp; MontBlanc Legend Intense are nice alternatives.<br />
<br />
I'm not quite feeling the comparisons to Dior Sauvage &amp; Prada Luna Rossa Carbon..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1390862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1390862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1390009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1390009" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Donsjohnson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350405"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Donsjohnson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1390009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1390009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350405">Donsjohnson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-10">08/10/21 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Most designer scents by intent are trying to be ma$$ appealing with code words like "safe", "inoffensive", "versatile", "dumb reach", etc. Most of the population are not fraghead  hobbyists. Nothing wrong with that. They just go in looking for a scent that is immediately appealing to them and maybe their significant other that doesn't cost an arm and a leg. As far as designers, I can't think of many that achieve this intent better than the Coach line. Are they unique? Nope. Are they groundbreaking? Nope. Are they beast in performance? Nope. (You get what you pay for--this isn't a $100+ designer frag where weaker performance starts to become a valid gripe). Are they relatively mass-appealing, safe, inoffensive, value buy, dumb reaches? I say yes. I think Coach consistently pulls this off with their whole line, of which Coach Platinum is arguably the best--simply a slightly richer/heavier, slightly metallic version of the original Coach for Men. To most less experienced noses who want a pleasant, easy going casual scent that everyone at least "likes" and no one hates, you can't go wrong with Coach Platinum or the others in the line.  But even for niche lovers, this is a scent you quick throw on when you go out running errands for a couple hours and don't want to use your more costly niche juice.<br />
<br />
Coach Platinum (if not also the whole line) is the King of Safe, Dumb Reaches. If you judge it just based on its relatively low price and just on what it's trying to be rather than what it is not, I think it deserves a high score.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1390009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1390009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1387755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1387755" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Doriani06"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Doriani06" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1387755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1387755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343581">Doriani06</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-06">08/06/21 10:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Has similarities with sauvage EDP in my opinion.<br />
But still quite different.<br />
The dry down is basically sweet vanilla, it dominates all the other notes.<br />
Smells very cheap and on second try i had to scrub it off. My wife disliked it also and told me to go take a shower. Not sure how so many people can enjoy it but oh well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1387755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1387755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1384008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It seems to be exceedingly light on me and disappears within an hour or so.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1384008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1384008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1383667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1383667" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AD80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1351872.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AD80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo"title="Polo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1383667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1383667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351872">AD80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-29">07/29/21 19:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The comparisons of how this smells varies wildly because of something in it sensitive to people’s chemistry…I sprayed it on the card at the store and liked it, sprayed it on my arm?  It changed completely, almost into Prada lhome leau without the ozone, real smooth with the pineapple, vanilla, and sandalwood taking center stage with a powdery vibe even after the dry down.  Also it lingers real nice (on me) and can be worn year round in my opinion…not bad for my first Coach scent 8.7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1383667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1383667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1382842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1382842" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Basman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/682001"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.682001.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Basman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1382842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1382842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/682001">Basman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-28">07/28/21 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't own sauvage so i can't comment on that but i do own luna rossa carbon. And this is a little closer to it then i thought.<br />
Might have gone with something else if i knew how close it was.<br />
That said, i really like it more then that. As it is less formal and more casual. Seems to project quite well on my skin and linger on. I expect quite a bit of positive comments. And probably will like this more then i liked the original as that one could become a bit boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1382842"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1382842#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1380834" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1380834" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Paternostral25"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357643"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Paternostral25" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1380834ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1380834" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357643">Paternostral25</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-24">07/24/21 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is actually one of my favorites in my collection just because it is so versatile without being too generic and the vanilla is so well balanced and not too overly sweet so that you can also wear it on summer evenings if it is not too hot but also in winter imo. It's long lasting and just smells so awesome. It is slightly fresh but I don't really get sauvage in there. I love the bottle, sprayer is terrible tho</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1380834"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1380834#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1372007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1372007" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="A.K.48004L"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233249"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1233249.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="A.K.48004L" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1372007ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1372007" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233249">A.K.48004L</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-07">07/07/21 07:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A modern fragrance with classical touches , fresh fruity “almost creamy” pineapple vanilla, especially at the top, then it gets slightly less fruity and less fresh and became a bit more woody aromatic masculine, well balanced woody fruity fresh, a hint of shaving cream , pleasant and very nice scent and easy to wear. Imo not leaning feminine but start unisex then it gets more masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1372007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1372007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1366400" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1366400" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tumiknows"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288158"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1288158.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tumiknows" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bentley/Bentley-for-Men-Intense-17666.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17666.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bentley for Men Intense"title="Bentley for Men Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1366400ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1366400" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288158">tumiknows</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-26">06/26/21 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a new fragrance for me. My first impression... definitely not sweet. You get the hint of pineapple. I'm going to wear it for a while. I'll have an updated review afterward.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1366400"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1366400#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1365832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1365832" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rafrosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321272"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321272.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rafrosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1365832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1365832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321272">Rafrosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-25">06/25/21 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is more airy/aromatic than I would have guessed. I would assume this is due to the heavy Geranium note that dominates the fragrance. The creamy pineapple/vanilla notes lie beneath the airy, menthol of the geranium and other herbal notes. This is not a sweet fragrance, rather it smells like a minty, herbal pineapple.<br />
<br />
In my experience, the best part about this fragrance is the sillage. It smells slightly better in the air than on skin. The sillage is absolutely gorgeous! Performance is average, similar to the original Coach for Men. All this being said, it is a unique and well made fragrance. I prefer the original, however I do believe Platinum is more versatile- certainly signature scent worthy. 8/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1365832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1365832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1359318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1359318" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alcsence"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alcsence" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1359318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1359318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233909">Alcsence</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-13">06/13/21 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its so weird everyone saying this is sweet, to me it’s one of the least sweet fragrances I own, I smell zero sweetness, just a kind of fuzzy creaminess, super tart acidity and vanilla. Nothing even remotely sweet, especially not bubblegum sweet.<br />
 It seems everyone smells this one differently, maybe batch differences or just different noses? So odd. It does have a slight resemblance to Luna rossa carbon though without the freshness. No lavender in this scent at all either. <br />
Also has nothing to do with the original coach for men which I love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1359318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1359318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1358873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
