Scent 7/10<br />
Performance 7.5/10<br />
Longevity 8/10<br />
Versatility 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1352580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1352580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1345049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1345049" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gsidedgdb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313393"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1313393.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gsidedgdb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1345049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1345049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313393">Gsidedgdb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-17">05/17/21 21:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This does not smell like sauvage. It is similar as in it's in the same scent profile. If I had to choose between the two of which smells better, I would pick coach. As far as longevity, projection, and sillage? Sauvage.. coach is no slouch in those areas but dior is just a higher quality fragrance. Coach smells better tho. Still an awesome all around scent and anyone who says it isn't must have gotten a bad batch or they're just hating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1345049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1345049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1344442" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1344442" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marxwick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marxwick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Ambre-Narguile-2669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"title="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1344442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1344442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083">Marxwick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-16">05/16/21 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The powdery fruity opening resembles Ultra Male mix with vanilla and sandalwood. Then the dry down is a less peppery and metallic version of Sauvage. <br />
Longevity and projection die down after 2 hours. <br />
Overall it is decent and inexpensive to try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1344442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1344442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1340749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1340749" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cagatay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cagatay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Absolute-43040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Absolute"title="Gucci Guilty Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1340749ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1340749" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1330996" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sajoma2010"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sajoma2010" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Cologne-53694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Cologne"title="Gentleman Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1330996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1330996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178655">Sajoma2010</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-23">04/23/21 13:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Platinum is a very nice take on the original coach, this one is smooth, pleasant, not ponging, it has a nice sweet vanilla that stays throughout the life of the fragrance. Projection and longevity is moderate, will give you complements overall it’s nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1330996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1330996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1330988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1330988" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ConA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ConA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1330988ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1330988" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330186">ConA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-23">04/23/21 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had this for a few months, in the tester for awhile that I had received and then I have recently purchased a 3.3oz bottle. Lasts 8+ Hours. At 31 dollars for a tester on eBay, I bet you won't find much better for the price. Very strong vanilla scent. The pineapple lasts 5 minutes tops and then becomes a vanilla and pepper bomb. Protip: Put a flashlight under the bottle and it creates a cool light show. This is also great for checking how much juice you've got left. I haven't met any girls that aren't a fan of this one so far. The sprayer (atomizer) is substandard, eh who cares though, it can be placed in another bottle if desired.<br />
<br />
9/10 Scent<br />
8/10 Longevity<br />
9.5/10 Value<br />
4/10 Sprayer<br />
<br />
Age Range 15-30</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1330988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1330988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1330600" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324425">d.trenchev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-23">04/23/21 02:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’ve had this for two years now and in my opinion it’s totally underrated. The quality and the blend that you get from Coach Platinum is amazing for this price range.<br />
 <br />
And it has everything - it’s soft but not intimate, it’s bold without being too strong. It’s great if you want to dress it up or enjoy a casual weekend with friends. You can wear it on a date, you can wear it in the office. It’s super versatile and I always receive compliments when I’m wearing this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1330600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1330600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1326203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1323559" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WhoNose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/363929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WhoNose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1323559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1323559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/363929">WhoNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-11">04/11/21 09:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The pineapple is nice but VERY short lived. The pineapple lasts for about 2 minutes max for me and I wish they would of made it last longer into the scent. The rest of the fragrance quickly goes into a strong vanilla with cashmeran dancing in the background. Projection is mild and longevity is about 8-10 hours. I would say age range is 18-35 any occasion. This does not smell like Savauge at all. A better comparison would be Givenchy Pi. Image Givenchy Pi but just with a burst of pineapple in the beginning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1323559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1323559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1318912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1318912" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saavmt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305758.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saavmt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Perfect-Sense-Mane/Yu-1769.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1769.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yu"title="Yu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1318912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1318912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305758">Saavmt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-03">04/03/21 14:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a young man's (30 and under) dumb reach scent. It could be worn in the office, but I usually reserve this for running errands. I get No resemblance to Savauge, but it IS in the same playing field. For those who say it does not last long, I recommend layering this with Escentric Molecules 02 specifically for longevity. Other than that, great dumb reach, mostly year round, day or night fragrance. 8/10!<br />
<br />
Edit: I take back what I said earlier. I definitely does have resemblance of Savauge, but more of a smoother touch, rather than near your face at all times with Savauge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1318912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1318912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1316312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1316312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="upandcoming"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293396.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="upandcoming" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1316312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1316312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); The opening is very pleasant, but it transforms into a damn corn husk. IT SMELLS LIKE A CORN HUSK. HOW DID THEY DO THAT. I spent 10 minutes scrubbing it off of my hand. Worst $50 I've ever spent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1316312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1316312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1308863" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1308863" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anthonycball"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1273491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anthonycball" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Sweetie-Aoud-31493.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31493.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweetie Aoud"title="Sweetie Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1308863ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1308863" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491">anthonycball</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-16">03/16/21 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fruity pineapple. Creamy vanilla. The bright opening works as a perfect pick-me up when I need it, while the vanilla is soothing when needed too. <br />
<br />
Perfect for every-day wear, most any occasion. The chrome bottle stands out in my collection. The best of the three in the Coach For Men line in my opinion. Reccomended.<br />
<br />
Rating: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1308863"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1308863#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1308227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1305158" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beetus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311981"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311981.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beetus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1305158ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1305158" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); The performance isn't cray cray, but for the price I don't mind going a little heavier on the sprays. I can kind see the comparison to Sauvage, but this bad boi is sweeter (love the vanilla) and much less douchey.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1305158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1305158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1304332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1304332" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BEmmett20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BEmmett20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Himalaya-465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himalaya"title="Himalaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1304332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1304332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306024">BEmmett20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-08">03/08/21 12:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this after falling for   many of the YouTube videos that hyped this fragrance to be one of the best releases of 2018. Why do I do that?!<br />
<br />
In my humble opinion, it’s a fine fragrance for the younger crowd (30 and under), but too much of the synthetic bubblegum sweetness in the open for an older gentleman to pull off convincingly - and for full disclosure I’m in my late 30s. <br />
<br />
Overall: 2/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1304332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1304332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1303154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1303154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JayStar773"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JayStar773" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Liam-85097.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85097.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Liam"title="Liam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1303154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1303154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311692">JayStar773</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-05">03/05/21 23:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I kinda get the Sauvage comparisons. From a regular nose such as myself, they’re in the same family, not the same fragrance however.<br />
<br />
This opens up with a bit of fruitiness and freshness. After that, it reminds me of a lavender, vanilla type candle that’s wearable as a fragrance. It’s pleasing.<br />
<br />
Works all year round, signature scent worthy. Performance could be better, but if you spray more, it wouldn’t be an issue.<br />
<br />
If you like Sauvage, but think it’s not unique enough, get this. It’s in the same family, but remove the ambroxan and replace it with cashmeran and lots of vanilla.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1303154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1303154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1300770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1300770" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chong Solo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1294959.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chong Solo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Aqva-Pour-Homme-153.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.153.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqva Pour Homme"title="Aqva Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1300770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1300770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); I don't get any Sauvage vibes off of this one, but I do get plenty of compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1300770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1300770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1295716" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1295716" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yannickcz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1199472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yannickcz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Parfum-75126.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75126.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Parfum"title="Armani Code Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1295716ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1295716" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199472">Yannickcz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-20">02/20/21 00:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing special, smells like Sauvage. Longevity zero. Projection zero. Garbage!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1295716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1295716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1288216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1288216" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bfreepro417"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195501"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1195501.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bfreepro417" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Oud-Noir-17338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Oud Noir"title="Versace Pour Homme Oud Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1288216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1288216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195501">Bfreepro417</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-06">02/06/21 14:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While this is a bit synthetic and can be labeled as "generic", don't let that fool you... this is a fragrance worthy of your attention if you are into rich, sweet, fruity/creamy fragrances. My first impressions in the store were: "damn this is sweet...but damn this is GOOD..." There's a fruity freshness to it that I really enjoy, and some slight spice, but it feels very warm and rich due to the vanilla. For this reason, it may come off as cloying in hot weather, or if you overspray, so keep that in mind.<br />
<br />
I get a lot of fruitiness and rich, vanilla sweetness and warmth, but there's enough going on with the other notes to keep this interesting and give it some depth. I could easily see a lesser blended fragrance feeling very shallow and bland, but this one does something right. It's certainly not a niche-level fragrance, or even in the highest tier of designer fragrances, but it's not bad at all. <br />
<br />
I can absolutely smell the similarities with Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, but I also feel it shares equal similarities with fragrances like Polo Red, Versace Eros, Boss Bottled EDP, and it does not really feel like a chemically, mineral/scratchy fragrance like Sauvage or Carbon, though the similarities are there, even if you don't like those, it's very possible you might like this. <br />
<br />
I would like it better if it went lighter on the vanilla and had more sandalwood. I think it would make this more versatile, it can really feel like a gourmand fragrance with the richness of the vanilla, and I would prefer it to be a bit fresher, but it's still quite good. I can't see it being received well in the summer or spring, it just feels too warm and thick, but it's winter now and it ticks all the right boxes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1288216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1288216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1285195" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1285195" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hamodi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302438"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302438.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hamodi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1285195ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1285195" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302438">hamodi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-01">02/01/21 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>one of the best fragrances ive ever used , great for both summer and winter time</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1285195"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1285195#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1284551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1284551" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jhona1971"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jhona1971" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1284551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1284551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301796">Jhona1971</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-30">01/30/21 21:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance. Yes does this have a similarity to sauvage...yes! But it's actually closer to Prada luna Rossa Carbon which to me is the better of the two. Now just imagine carbon with a very juicy and fresh pineapple plus vanilla. Take out the lavender from carbon and you have this scent. It's reminiscent of it but definitely does it's own thing and does not make it a redundant purchase if you have both. The vanilla is tame but definitely there. This fragrance does have longevity issues. But to me its not an issue this is such an affordable cologne that you should just submit to spraying more and you'll fix the issue. This on average costs 30-40 bucks online a steal in my opinion. The opening of this fragrance is definitely the best part of it and unfortunately it loses its character along the way. It loses much of it's freshness along the way and the vanilla and powder becomes more prominent. This is disappointing because the opening is gorgeous... But wait i have a fix! Now hear me out I know this may be a sacrilegious statement but just spray this on your clothes! Not only does the pineapple become more intense but the freshness stays on much longer. Making that awesome opening stay longer and that powderyness that some people don't like tone down alot. We need to stop treating every cologne the same and become a bit more inventive on wearing our colognes. The typical 2 sprays to the neck and one on each wrist may not be enough or do justice to a cologne. Not only will using this on your clothes make the best part of this fragrance last longer but extends the life of it because the oils from your skin are not eating up the life of the fragrance prematurely. Now some colognes are definitely best sprayed on skin. For example the original Angel Man by theory mugler smells like tarry nonsense on paper but on skin its awesome! The opposite is true for this fragrance. Give this cologne a try and see if these tips help you enjoy the fragrance more. I love it I give it an overall. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1284551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1284551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1270829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104410">HARDSTYLE916</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-05">01/05/21 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sauvage??? Too many trolls these days. This is sweet with vanilla, woody and leather notes. Now, if people are serious, Sauvage is a take/copycat of the original Montblanc Legend/Jimmy Choo Man minus the fruity pineapple/red apple opening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1270829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1270829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1269928" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1269928" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bfish88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1144812.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bfish88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Journey-Man-25251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Journey Man"title="Journey Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1269928ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1269928" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144812">Bfish88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-03">01/03/21 11:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The BEST of the Coach line! It does smell very similar to the original Coach for men, but the cashmere and vanilla not only set it apart,  they improve the performance. I don't get a straight up clone of sauvage here, Platinum is much more smooth,more rounded, a bit less on performance than Sauvage but is more enjoyable fragrance in my opinion. <br />
<br />
This scent takes me back to when I was about 10 years old and had a plastic Avon razor, baby powder and aftershave kit. The scent transports me to that time even though this isn't exactly a baby powder or after shave Barbershop fragrance, but it reminds me strongly of that scent I got from combining the powder and aftershave when I was trying to be like dad. This will always be in my collection!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1269928"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1269928#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1268051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1268051" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bdeville"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1203829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bdeville" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1268051ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1268051" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1203829">Bdeville</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-30">12/30/20 18:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this a few hours ago, its the second or third time I try it. I  do get the peppery and leathery vibe and patchouli, vanilla is there  for sure which all combined gave a chocolate sensation to me?, idk. Kinda disliked the opening but seems like the drydown settled nicely with the vanilla and leather. I can see why this is compared to sauvage but is really spinning in a little different direction. I would only reach for this if sauvage is out of the budget really, and preferred the other coach edt for men instead which I enjoy alot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1268051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1268051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1267368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1267368" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentsibilities"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286339"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentsibilities" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Red-Tobacco-46663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Tobacco"title="Red Tobacco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1267368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1267368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286339">Scentsibilities</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-29">12/29/20 13:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a awesome versatile fragrence considering its price it's an all season all occasions.Its fresh and clean enough to be a professional scent but sweet and seductive enough to be a date fragrence.It combines Sauvage like freshness with a creamy vanillic tone and sandalwood.<br />
<br />
The performance is sufficient this is a strong 4/5 imo it's not a niche masterpiece but many of those scents do not work in practical circumstances or if they do they are suited to very niche situations.I really love this juice and I would advise anyone looking for a reasonably priced crowd pleasing all season workhorse to buy this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1267368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1267368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1265332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1265332" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kelz23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235002"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kelz23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Givree-72439.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72439.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"title="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1265332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1265332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); Fresh, slightly sweet with that vanilla note in there which also makes it kind of creamy. Wore this on a cooler day and man I loved it. But it safe for all seasons IMO. This was a blind buy for me. And this Smells nothing like Sauvage, idk what these people are sniffing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1265332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1265332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1261611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1261611" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jarno1208"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1269327.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jarno1208" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Tonka-Cola-76893.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76893.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka Cola"title="Tonka Cola"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1261611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1261611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); If you love sauvage then you might want to check this one out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1261611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1261611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1256294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I wish it had somewhat of a fruity background, maybe a bergamot added would be better <br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1254648"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1254648#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1249760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1249760" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vapor Trail"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1025146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vapor Trail" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1249760ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1249760" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025146">Vapor Trail</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-17">11/17/20 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Decent pineapple opening with a smooth vanilla and cashmere drydown. That part really surprised me; it smells much more unique than I was expecting. It's definitely a versatile and mass-appealing smell but it has its own merits and wouldn't be redundant if you own lots of those Macy's counter fragrances. It's also far, far more interesting than the original Coach for Men.<br />
<br />
This smells NOTHING like Sauvage. I have no idea where all those votes are coming from.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1249760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1249760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1227159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1227159" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samteeter93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255767"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="samteeter93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermès"title="Terre d'Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1227159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1227159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255767">samteeter93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-21">09/21/20 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I told the sales clerk I wanted a fresh, easy scent for everyday use, and this fits the bill. It starts smelling herbal and soapy, with a rich sweet scent (vanilla, floral notes) that gets stronger over time. It's a very nice smell; I often have to fight the urge to lean in and sniff my own chest during the first hour.<br />
<br />
I see people comparing this to Jimmy Choo. It's an apt comparison. This fragrance is stronger, and has more of a soapy, barbershop-smelling top note; with Jimmy Choo I mostly got a faint, artificial sweetness.<br />
<br />
One word of warning: over time, I found that the top note died down significantly, leaving a sweet, floral base. By the end of the day I smell like sugar cookies. This unfortunately is not a good fit for me, as sweet smells tend to make me nauseous over time. Expect to smell sweeter than what you smell in the store.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1227159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1227159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1224421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1224421" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FaithfulServantoftheLord"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FaithfulServantoftheLord" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boucheron/Jaipur-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-64096.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64096.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jaipur Homme Eau de Parfum"title="Jaipur Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1224421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1224421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);
