align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1224421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1224421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1221118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1221118" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gabrielsalazar808"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247412"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247412.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gabrielsalazar808" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1221118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1221118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247412">gabrielsalazar808</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-06">09/06/20 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my clubbing king for me. Too playful to be a date fragrance and the vanilla might be too cloying for daytime use. It does smell like Sauvage with added vanilla and some pineapple sweetness to round it all out. Performance is above average.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1221118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1221118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1220515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1220515" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sensitive_nose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sensitive_nose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Lucky"title="1 Million Lucky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1220515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1220515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204584">sensitive_nose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-04">09/04/20 22:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The probability of meeting Fragrance enthusiasts while going about your daily routine is very low. However you meet normal people (the masses) everytime everywhere (Office, work, mall, restaurant etc). So it would make sense to wear fragrances that you like and that the masses would appreciate. Whether it is "inspiring" or not. Cheap or not.<br />
<br />
Coach Platinum proved that to me. Initially I thought it was just an OK fragrance. It smells like you take Prada Luna Rosa Carbon and add a lot of Vanilla and do some tweaks.<br />
<br />
However, I discovered this fragrance gets me lots of compliments from random people. The most memorable one was the day I entered a store, walked past the cashier area and into the isles to grab some items. Then a lady walked up to me and said:<br />
 "apologies to walk up to you like this, I love the perfume you are wearing and I would want to get one for my husband for father's day".<br />
I thanked her and told her the perfume was Coach Platinum and told her where she could get it. Funny thing was I had gone nose blind to the scent at that point (about 1-2hrs in). The sillage is very good. Very beautiful scent trail.<br />
 <br />
The only other perfumes that have gotten me this kind of random compliment from complete strangers are CH Men, Spicebomb and La Nuit.<br />
<br />
Of course not everyone who likes your perfume would tell you but if compliments from the masses is what you are after (or mass appeal), then Coach Platinum would do the job. Simple. People around you would just love this stuff even if they do not have the courage to tell you (IMHO it takes some courage for a random person to walk up to you and compliment you on a fragrance).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1220515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1220515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1214017" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1214017" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TyretiquetteRex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1211331.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TyretiquetteRex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gendarme/Gendarme-7190.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7190.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gendarme"title="Gendarme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1214017ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1214017" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211331">TyretiquetteRex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-20">08/20/20 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is what the original Coach for men should have been. I'm in love with this stuff. Fresh, fruity, well blended, long lasting. The vanilla note is what does it for me. Synthetic, but very well done. I'm already looking for back up bottles! This is the kind of fragrance that may have women more apt to go places with you, if you know what I mean. Don't sleep on this fellas!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1214017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1214017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1207052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
It is a pleasant smell though, the vanilla note is what takes over for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1206309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1206309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1205792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1097321">coolephelps</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-30">07/30/20 18:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rochas Man is what this fragrance resembles. There's no coffee in Platinum but the two are really close. Now to see if Platinum lasts longer than my coworkers smoke break because Rochas doesn't.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1205792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1205792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1201608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1201608" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EauDeBaldy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259496.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EauDeBaldy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Legend-11784.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11784.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legend"title="Legend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1201608ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1201608" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259496">EauDeBaldy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-19">07/19/20 19:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wish I could share in what some say on here by loving it.<br />
<br />
To me, this smells like an older man, barbershop talc powder on the neck smell after your haircut.<br />
<br />
It's definitely not bad if you are into that but for me, I just can't like this.<br />
<br />
I gave it some time, and from the initial spray to the dry down, there isn't that much of a change from the barbershop smell.<br />
<br />
Again, if you like that style, then you will likely love this, if not, then pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1201608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1201608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1199069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1199069" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ryanjosephr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ryanjosephr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50777.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coach Platinum"title="Coach Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1199069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1199069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246508">ryanjosephr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-12">07/12/20 23:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In a nutshell, this is Givenchy's Pi (vanilla gourmand) and Dior's Sauvage (that piercingly strong base note of woodiness). Much like the previously mentioned colognes, you'll either love or hate this. Fortunately, it's been well received the times I've worn it. The projection is very strong like Sauvage, so don't be the meathead who oversprays this. Lasting power is about 10 hours in my experience, and that's in the DC heat. Overall a nice fragrance that could easily go horribly wrong with spraying more than twice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1199069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1199069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1198312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1198312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vtec_Malaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1215994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vtec_Malaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cedrat-Boise-15211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat Boise"title="Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1198312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1198312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215994">Vtec_Malaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-11">07/11/20 01:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a beast....apply at 2200 Hrs until 0900 Hrs next day still can smells this,fantastic juice</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1198312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1198312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1187771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1187771" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brother Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1163370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brother Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Eau-de-Parfum-84094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"title="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1187771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1187771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163370">Brother Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-13">06/13/20 04:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance seems to be a cross between CK Eternity Now and Dior Sauvage. The dry down has a vibe that smells like ambroxan. On that note, this Coach Platinum concoction is fine until the dry down. I initially tried it on the tester card. It starts with a smooth, sweet vanilla vibe with a touch of freshness and what seems to be a hint of pineapple/coconut. VERY NICE. Then, it dries down to a different tune that's hard to describe. I actually thought that the store attendant had mistakenly given me a sample of a new type of Sauvage instead of Coach Platinum when I tried it at home and allowed it to come alive. Anyhow, this fragrance will be great for most, but not for those who can't tolerate ambroxan or whatever is in this that smells like it.<br />
<br />
BEWARE: This fragrance is a smooth operator that will BAIT you with a REALLY APPEALING opening and SWITCH to an unknown character that is eerily similar to the "Johnny Depp" stuff. Ultimately, if you like that stuff, then you'll love this stuff...probably enough to make you wanna strut your stuff. However, if you're not a fan of that stuff, then this stuff will not be the right stuff for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1187771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1187771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1180962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1180962" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sam Diaz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1207634.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sam Diaz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvatore-Ferragamo/F-by-Ferragamo-Black-5002.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5002.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="F by Ferragamo Black"title="F by Ferragamo Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1180962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1180962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207634">Sam Diaz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-27">05/27/20 13:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can understand the comparisons to Dior Sauvage to a certain degree, but the vanilla note in this fragrance is what really separates them apart. By far the most notable note, vanilla really gives this fragrance a sweet, and rich vibe that in my opinion goes really well in cooler months, and could even be suited in early Spring time. It has garnered me several compliments, so it is a people pleaser if that's what you're after.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1180962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1180962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="50777" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent974019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc974019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CB23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/998670"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.998670.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CB23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Amber-Sky-39886.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39886.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Sky"title="Amber Sky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma974019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd974019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/998670">CB23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-21">08/21/18 21:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As usual, ignore the reviews this is nothing like Sauvage, god knows what people’s intentions are to mislead others so much on here</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="974019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=974019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1417406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1417406" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perryry2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230626"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230626.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="perryry2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Tres-Fraiche-24060.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.24060.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Eau Tres Fraiche"title="Terre d'Hermes Eau Tres Fraiche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1417406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1417406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230626">perryry2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-26">09/26/21 11:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have no idea what these people are talking about on here.  Smells Nothing like Sauvage, or Luna Rossa Carbon.  <br />
To sum this up, this is a very mass appealing creamy pineapple fragrance.  The most prominent notes would be the pineapple, and the sandalwood, and vanilla.  with less prominent but still there leather, and cashmeran.  The juniper, and pepper, and sage just act to lift the creaminess and make the opening a little more crisp and refreshing.  Overall I think this is a completely unique fragrance.  There are plenty of Aventus style pineapple and juniper, or pineapple and current fragrances out there this one takes the refreshing pineapple opening and goes in a powdery creamy direction with its vanilla/sandalwood/leather/cashmeran.  I think it dries down to a powdery leather vibe with the vanilla and leather. I can't think of anything similar to this.  I think thats why the reviews are so all over the place.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1417406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1417406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1179886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1179886" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="piyux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230413"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230413.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="piyux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1179886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1179886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230413">piyux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-24">05/24/20 23:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Platinum has a sweet fruity and spicy opening, very pleasant and aromatic. The pineapple and juniper berries combine well, the second adds a soft woody, pine-like accord that enhances the sweet and acidic notes of the pineapple. The black pepper follows closely adding a soft spicy accord. The initial sharpness of the pineapple accord is short-lived and it recedes a bit. The sage enters the blend contributing with a green and minty accord; the geranium adds a soft floral and green touch, and the Cashmeran adds a woody, ambery, slightly powdery note the help boosting projection. Finally, Coach Platinum EDP reaches its base notes. The patchouli and leather are almost unnoticeable; on the other hand, the vanilla is not, it adds its aromatic and sweet accord that makes all other tones more palatable; finally, the sandalwood adds its fresh woody touch. The sweetness of the pineapple drops a little as the fragrance transitions from the opening to the dry-down and it is replaced by the vanilla. Once Coach Platinum has reached its full dry-down, it can be summarized as a moderate projecting, slightly powdery sweet vanilla and pineapple fragrance with some woody, green and spicy accords. The fragrance feels aromatic, delectable, fresh, inviting, masculine, modern, natural, nicely blended, relaxing, and very pleasant.<br />
<br />
BATCH REVIEWED: 2019 (#08I42I170A)<br />
WOW RATING: 9/10. Coach Platinum brings a very pleasant combination of notes.<br />
DISLIKE RATING: 0/10. This fragrance does not contain any offensive notes.<br />
UNIQUENESS: 6/10. This scent is relatively common, yet Coach Platinum has its character.<br />
MASS APPEAL: 10/10. This is a crowd-pleasing fragrance, the combination of pineapple, vanilla and aromatic woods is inviting and will be easily appreciated.<br />
PROJECTION: 2/10. Low, about two feet around the wearer.<br />
SILLAGE: 2/10 Low, about two feet behind the wearer.<br />
APPLICATION: Six atomizations to compensate for low projection and sillage.<br />
LONGEVITY: 4/10. It projects for about two hours then it drops quickly.<br />
SEASONS: Any.<br />
OCCASIONS: Formal events, outdoor gatherings, office, business, casual, romantic, dating. This is an office-friendly fragrance. <br />
VERSATILITY: 10/10. This is a highly versatile fragrance that will fit almost any occasion.<br />
GENDER: Masculine. Its woody accords tilt it to the masculine side but not for much.<br />
AGES: Any.<br />
RECOMMENDATION: Coach Platinum can be found discounted for under $40, it would be nice if its performance would be better, but its pleasant notes and great versatility make of it a great buy.<br />
BLIND-BUY: Yes.<br />
SIMILAR: Bond No 9 Scent of Peace for Him is a great fragrance and features pineapple, woods, juniper berry, and sweet notes; Dua Fragrances – Poseidon's Tux has a great projection and performance, and brings pineapple, floral and woody accords; Ferrari Scuderia Forte Men EDP contains apple, pineapple, vanilla, and woods, a good office scent and very versatile; Mancera Cedrat Boice is an outstanding performer that brings pineapple, citrus, spicy, woods, and vanilla accords; Mont Blanc Legend EDT is a good and popular fragrance containing pineapple, citrus, floral, woods and tonka notes.<br />
SUMMARY: A moderate projecting, slightly powdery sweet vanilla and pineapple fragrance with some woody, green and spicy accords that feel aromatic, delectable, fresh, inviting, masculine, modern, natural, nicely blended, relaxing, and very pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1179886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1179886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1207052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1207052" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragmeister"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragmeister" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Absolu-53106.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53106.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Absolu"title="Armani Code Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1207052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1207052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249296">Fragmeister</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-03">08/03/20 11:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells nothing like sauvage. It's a sweet and fruity vanilla-y freshie. Very pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1207052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1207052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1443849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1443849" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Harry_Gill"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1217915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Harry_Gill" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1443849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1443849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217915">Harry_Gill</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-11">11/11/21 02:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heavily underrated scent the opening is fresh pineapple which then drys down to a creamy vanilla easily wear any time of the year it is my signature scent longevity is good not great about 5 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1443849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1443849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="50777" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1384008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1384008" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kristoffer1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1358328"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1358328.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kristoffer1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Beverly-Hills/Giorgio-for-Men-1891.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1891.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Giorgio for Men"title="Giorgio for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1384008ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1384008" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1358328">Kristoffer1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-30">07/30/21 12:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was very disappointed in this. It seems to be exceedingly light on me and disappears within an hour or so.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1384008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1384008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent979515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc979515" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oleg533"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025122"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="oleg533" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma979515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd979515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025122">oleg533</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-07">09/07/18 03:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't like it.<br />
<br />
It has nothing in common with Dior Sauvage. It is sharp and sweet. Too sweet. Not sure if it's the vanilla, but the sweetness is off-putting for me. Not a huge fan of the original, but this one I really don't like.<br />
On me, became a skin scent after 2 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="979515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=979515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972091" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="coonhound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1881689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="coonhound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881689">coonhound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-08">11/08/23 18:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First Pass - Similar to Coach Men, there is the same apple, the spices are much fainter.  And something else, but I can't quite put my finger on it.  Almost powdery and metallic...  Like an old barber shop and a neck shave with warm cream <br />
<br />
The pyramid shows pineapple, black pepper, and juniper as top.  Cashmeran, sage, and geranium as middle.  I don't know why this smells more like apple to me than pineapple, but it does.  So did its predecessor<br />
<br />
I think the powder is coming from the cashmeran and geranium.  No idea where I got "metallic."  Either my brain chose a lazy descriptor based solely off the name, or my memory made an association with the straight razor of the barber<br />
<br />
1 Hour Later - Much sweeter.  It's a fruity sweetness, and more powdery.  Think warm apple pie dusted with baby powder.  I still can't discern pineapple, but that has to be where all the fruity sweetness originates<br />
<br />
Pyramid has vanilla, leather, sandalwood, patchouli for base.  Vanilla definitely.  Leather likely responsible for the powdery note.  I don't get sandalwood.  If patchouli is here it's delicate, not the heavy-handed earthiness that usually comes to mind<br />
<br />
Overall - Fans of sweet, powdery scents will enjoy this one.  The black pepper mixes with the base notes to give some interesting complexity.  I don't like powdery or floral scents of any degree, so for me it was a no<br />
<br />
***Scents, like tastes, are subjective. Wear what you like***</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1972091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1972091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent986335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc986335" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dkroonen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073495"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dkroonen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-Shock-For-Him-12520.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12520.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One Shock For Him"title="CK One Shock For Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma986335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd986335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073495">dkroonen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-29">09/29/18 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1st spray = headache, Sage start (bad)<br />
10min in vanilla/leather very masculine comforting <br />
Sandalwood in the background<br />
Leather accord seems to be more dominant then the vanilla. Comes off as a bit smokey.<br />
Difficult.<br />
2h in is drys down and the magic is gone<br />
Remains as a sweet vanilla skin scent.<br />
Worth it? I am certain there are better ones but when it’s sold for €20,- ... jup, worth it on that mark...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="986335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=986335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1256294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Disgusting</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50777"comment_id="1256294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Platinum-50777.html?ccid=1256294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="50777" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.97073.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>

                <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Lattafa-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Dior.html" class="en2inter">Dior</a>
        </span>
    </div>

            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">50.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Afnan.html" class="en2inter">Afnan</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>

    <script>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
